Posts.Content: Oct 1, 2015 06:37AM LilRoss wrote: Hi Shetland, I don't know what you mean by ILC bone mets. My stage 4 breast cancer was discovered by bone marrow biopsy. We weren't suspecting breast cancer. Anyway, we've been using the Ca markers and PET-CT scan to keep tabs on progress of bone mets. But I don't feel very confident in the PET-CT.. But I don't know what the ILC stands for in your question.
Posts.Title: Would PET-CT always show ILC bone mets? ShetlandPony Moissy
